FontString.name: $parentText
FontString.text: Welcome to Last Second Diminishing Return Display

FontString.name: $parentText
FontString.text: After checking the 'Display/Hide Anchors' checkbox, move the frames where you would like the DR icons to show up, then uncheck Display/Hide Anchors. Typing /lastsecond will reopen this screen. The anchors for arena1-5 represent the dr of your arena opponents, and will only show up during an arena match.
